changes:
* Added support for Crosswalk webview in tabs when running app as a `crosswalk` target.
* New modal browser methods: `addButton` and `removeButtons`.
* Added new option: `translucent` to configure iOS top bar translucency.
description:
APIs to deal with opening browser tabs and external sites within your app.

The tabs module allows you to open external sites in an un-trusted popup view that your users can close at any point.
